description: Another shining example of Miskilamo craftsmanship, the Rhode class is a scrapheap ball made of the bare minimum metal bits to keep a hull spaceproof. The often complimented spacious interiors are done for cost saving measures, not luxury. Most of these vessels have found themselves to be far from well-off cargo freighters, picking up the scrap and remains of the frontier to make more of these unfortunate hulls.
